BoolProperty.Name: LinkLibraryDependencies
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether or not library outputs from project dependencies are automatically linked in.

BoolProperty.Name: UseLibraryDependencyInputs
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether or not the inputs to the librarian tool are used rather than the library file itself when linking in library outputs of project dependencies.

EnumValue.Name: DisableAllWarnings
EnumValue.Description: Suppresses the output of all warning messages.

EnumValue.Name: NormalWarnings
EnumValue.Description: Run clang with normal warning output level.

EnumValue.Name: AllWarnings
EnumValue.Description: Display all possible warnings detected by clang.

BoolProperty.Name: IgnoreDynamicLinking
BoolProperty.Description: Normally emcc will simply link in code from the dynamic library as though it were statically linked, which will fail if the same dynamic library is linked more than once. With this option, dynamic linking is ignored, which allows the build system to proceed without errors.

StringListProperty.Name: JsLibrary
StringListProperty.Description: A JavaScript library to use in addition to those in Emscripten's core libraries (src/library_*).

StringListProperty.Name: PreJsFile
StringListProperty.Description: Specify a file whose contents are added before the emitted code and optimized together with it.

StringListProperty.Name: PostJsFile
StringListProperty.Description: Specify a file whose contents are added after the emitted code and optimized together with it.

StringListProperty.Name: EmbedFile
StringListProperty.Description: Specify a file (with path) to embed inside the generated JavaScript. The path is relative to the current directory at compile time. If a directory is passed here, its entire contents will be embedded.

StringListProperty.Name: PreloadFile
StringListProperty.Description: Specify a file to preload before running the compiled code asynchronously. The path is relative to the current directory at compile time. If a directory is passed here, its entire contents will be embedded.

StringListProperty.Name: ExcludeFile
StringListProperty.Description: Files and directories to be excluded from --embed-file and --preload-file. Wildcards (*) are supported.

StringListProperty.Name: HtmlShellFile
StringListProperty.Description: The path name to a skeleton HTML file used when generating HTML output. The shell file used needs to have this token inside it: "{{{ SCRIPT }}}". See src/shell.html and src/shell_minimal.html for examples.

EnumValue.Name: O1
EnumValue.Description: This does not include various runtime assertions in JS that -O0 would do.

EnumValue.Name: O2
EnumValue.Description: This will also enable various JavaScript optimizations.

BoolProperty.Name: RunClosureCompiler
BoolProperty.Description: Forces the closure compiler to be run as part of the build or skips it if set to false.

BoolProperty.Name: RunMinify
BoolProperty.Description: Skips the JS code minification process if set to false.

StringListProperty.Name: EnableWarnings
StringListProperty.Description: Specify one or more warnings to be enabled.

StringListProperty.Name: DisableWarnings
StringListProperty.Description: Specify one or more warnings to be suppressed.

BoolProperty.Name: TreatWarningAsError
BoolProperty.Description: Treats all linker warnings as errors.

BoolProperty.Name: EchoCommandLines
BoolProperty.Description: Print out the commands emcc is invoked with during linking.
